alert.note: Alert for Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 7:10PM CDT until May 06 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL TILLMAN AND NORTHEASTERN WILBARGER COUNTIES... At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Davidson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Frederick, Davidson, Hollister, Loveland, and Oklaunion. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
